**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 223 **Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) --- You surround your unarmed attacks with the speed and force of air. Make three [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) Strikes against the same target. If at least one was a successful hit, the target must attempt a Fortitude save or be [pushed](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) back 5 feet for each normal hit from the buffet, plus 10 feet for each critical hit. **Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target is pushed back half the normal distance.
**Failure** The target is pushed back the normal distance.
**Critical Failure** The target is pushed back double the normal distance and then knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).
name: Unfolding Wind Buffet
